Description: A beautiful Abalone vine of life inlay is featured on the Schecter C 1 Classic. Other features include a rosewood fingerboard, neck-through maple/walnut multi-ply neck construction, 25.5″ scale length. Natural wood binding on the body and the neck. Satin Gold hardware and Seymour Duncan pickups, Mahogany body with quilted maple arched top.
